summary: A collection of command‑line tools that transform and package speech‑recognition data for NVIDIA NeMo pipelines. They convert HuggingFace ASR datasets into NeMo JSON manifests, create tarred and sharded audio‑text datasets, generate DALI‑compatible index files, and estimate duration bucket configurations for efficient loading.
business_intent: Enable rapid, scalable preparation of audio‑text corpora for automatic‑speech‑recognition model training, reducing storage overhead and improving data‑loading performance in production and research environments.
